Qikify: Machine learningÂ¶

PDF Version

Date: March 27, 2012 Version: 0.2.0

Source Repository: http://github.com/trela/qikify

qikify is a Python package providing data structures and algorithms for semiconductor manufacturing data analysis.

Note

This documentation assumes general familiarity with NumPy. If you haven’t used NumPy much or at all, do invest some time in learning about NumPy first.

See the package overview for more detail about what’s in the library.
